knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{python}
import time

system_time = time.asctime(time.localtime(time.time()))

print(f'The local time is {system_time}')
print(f'My favourite emoji:\N{HUGGING FACE} \U0001F61D')
```

```{python}
import datetime

system_date = datetime.datetime.now()

print(f'The date today is {system_time:%Y-%m-%d}')
```


```{r}
library(stringr)

date_format <- scales::label_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d")

system_date = date_format(Sys.time())

str_glue("The date today is {system_date} \U0001F61D")

```
